resources.string: Please provide some information to customize the experience for you…!!
Enter your custom intake target in ml
Your daily work out time in min/day
Water is 60 percent of your body weight. Your body depends on water to survive.
Lack of water can lead to dehydration. Even mild dehydration can drain you and make you tired.
Every cell, tissue and organ in your body needs water to work properly.
2 glasses of water after waking up - helps activate internal organs
1 glass of water before going to bed - avoids stroke or heart attack
1 glass of water before taking a shower - helps lower blood pressure
1 glass of water 30 before a meal - helps digestion
Water speeds up the metabolism. To lose extra weight - drink more water
The brain and blood vessels function poorly with a lack of water. To prevent this from happening, maintain a normal water balance
Do you want to add this?
Water tracker that will remind you the water you need to drink in the rest of the day
Customized starting and ending time to drink water within a day
Graph and logs of date record
